statements: SELECT project_name, goal_amount FROM real_estate_projects WHERE goal_amount > 10000 ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM real_estate_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, current_funding FROM real_estate_projects WHERE current_funding < goal_amount ORDER BY current_funding ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM real_estate_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM real_estate_projects WHERE project_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_name, goal_amount FROM real_estate_projects ORDER BY goal_amount DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM real_estate_projects WHERE current_funding >= goal_amount;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM real_estate_projects WHERE end_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_id, blockchain_address, start_date, end_date FROM real_estate_projects ORDER BY end_date DESC, project_id ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description, goal_amount, current_funding FROM real_estate_projects WHERE project_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, funding_goal, current_funds FROM Campaigns WHERE funding_goal > 100000;
SELECT project_name, current_funds FROM Campaigns ORDER BY current_funds DESC;
SELECT backer_name, email, contribution FROM Backers;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE funding_goal > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, (current_funds / funding_goal) * 100 AS funding_percentage FROM Campaigns WHERE funding_goal >= 5000;
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(backer_id) AS total_backers FROM Backers GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING COUNT(backer_id) >= 5 ORDER BY total_backers DESC;

SELECT project_name, SUM(contribution) AS total_contributions FROM Campaigns INNER JOIN Backers ON Campaigns.campaign_id = Backers.campaign_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING SUM(contribution) > 1000 ORDER BY total_contributions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT project_name, start_date, target_amount FROM Campaigns WHERE target_amount > 1000;
SELECT backer_name, total_contribution FROM Backers WHERE total_contribution >= 500;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT campaign_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, target_amount FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE target_amount > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, SUM(total_contribution) AS total_contributions FROM Campaigns JOIN Backers ON Campaigns.campaign_id = Backers.backer_id GROUP BY project_name;

SELECT Backers.backer_name, Campaigns.project_name, Transactions.amount FROM Backers JOIN Transactions ON Backers.backer_id = Transactions.backer_id JOIN Campaigns ON Transactions.campaign_id = Campaigns.campaign_id WHERE Transactions.amount > 100 ORDER BY Transactions.amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id IN (SELECT campaign_id FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC) AND target_amount < 10000;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT project_name, funding_goal FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_description, funding_goal FROM Campaigns ORDER BY funding_goal DESC;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE funding_goal >= 5000.00;
SELECT * FROM Investors WHERE total_investment < 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT project_name, funding_goal FROM Campaigns WHERE funding_goal > 10000;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Investors WHERE total_investment < 5000;
SELECT project_name, funding_goal, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, funding_goal FROM projects WHERE funds_raised < funding_goal;
SELECT backer_name, total_invested FROM backers ORDER BY total_invested DESC;
SELECT project_name, end_date, funding_goal FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_name, reward_description, reward_value FROM projects JOIN rewards ON projects.project_id = rewards.project_id;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, funding_goal, funds_raised FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, funds_raised, funding_goal, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY end_date ASC, funds_raised DESC;
SELECT b.backer_name, SUM(i.amount_invested) AS total_investment FROM backers b JOIN investments i ON b.backer_id = i.backer_id GROUP BY b.backer_name ORDER BY total_investment DESC;

SELECT p.project_name, COUNT(r.reward_id) AS total_rewards FROM projects p LEFT JOIN rewards r ON p.project_id = r.project_id GROUP BY p.project_name HAVING total_rewards > 0 ORDER BY total_rewards DESC;
